thread.title: Terrible Service
thread.title_full: Terrible Service - Review of Citadines Trafalgar Square London, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Harjeet K
title: Terrible Service
text:
They made a mistake on my booking. I have all evidence that they made a mistake but will not take ownership and was treated badly. I tried to write to the President to complaint - that was 6 months ago - no word. Wrecked my couple days in London because of their mistake.
Room Tip: Good location though See more room tips
